Description: Item #: 13596 2011 Gibson melody maker SG with soft case Item is used in good to very good looking and working condition. Guitar has some lite signs of use on it. Guitar is sold with a black Gibson guitar soft case.Item is sold AS-IS shown in the photos. Listing consists of the Gibson guitar and soft case ONLY.Before purchasing the item PLEASE see all the photos, read the item description & Terms of Sale first.TERMS OF SALE: Please review these terms before bidding or purchasing. Thank you for viewing our listing. We’re happy to answer any questions you may have regarding our items. All items sold as shown in the photos. What you see in the photos is what you will receive. Please review the description and photos before bidding or purchasing. We only accept Paypal as payment. All payments must be made within 3 days of winning bid or purchase. New York State buyers are subject to applicable sales tax. SHIPPING: We use USPS and FedEx for our deliveries and only ship to a confirmed ebay/Paypal address. We will only ship to the address provided by ebay at the time of checkout. RETURNS: We only accept returns through ebay’s return system. Returned items must be in the same condition as received. We do not accept returns on the following… - New, sealed in box items that were opened. - Any item that has been modified or altered without our approval. - Coins and bullion. - Other specific items not mentioned above (see auction listing). BATTERY POLICY: Laptops, Tools, Watches, Cameras, etc…etc. Used batteries are variable. They can last minutes or hours. It is impossible for us to test each battery’s length of charge. It is our policy to guarantee that your battery will hold a charge but not the length of that charge. COUPONS: Coupons found on our website or in other advertisements DO NOT apply to ebay sales (including local pick-ups). Guitars: Most guitars we sell are pre-owned. They might have scratches or other blemishes that are typical of guitars that have been used. If there are any considerable scratches, dents, dings or cracks, we will mention it in our auction text. In some cases, strings might need to be replaced. Please consider this when bidding. Watches: Most of the watches we sell are pre-owned and will have normal wear from daily use. There will sometimes be small scratches on the band, bezel or crystal that might not be visible in the pictures. Also, if the watch runs on battery, we cannot guarantee the life of that battery. Please note this before bidding or purchasing.
